attributes.action: ALLOW US TO DECIDE IF WE WISH TO REMAIN IN TH E.U
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
THE BRITISH PUBLIC HAVE NEVER BEEN ALLOWED TO DECIDE IF THEY WISH TO BE PART OF THE E.U.
SELF DETERMINATION IS OUR RIGHT.
IT IS TIME WE HAD A REFERENDUM

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
